gen:link.msg:message: FATAL ERROR: In table [670-67] S1411 should be equal to S1401+S1402+S1403+S1404+S1405+S1406+S1407+S1408+S1409+S1410 with margin of error [1] {{abs([670-67:R14C11|RPC=Reporting period] ({$a}) - [670-67:R14C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$b}) + [670-67:R14C2|RPC=Reporting period] ({$c}) + [670-67:R14C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$d}) + [670-67:R14C4|RPC=Reporting period] ({$e}) + [670-67:R14C5|RPC=Reporting period] ({$f}) + [670-67:R14C6|RPC=Reporting period] ({$g}) + [670-67:R14C7|RPC=Reporting period] ({$h}) + [670-67:R14C8|RPC=Reporting period] ({$i}) + [670-67:R14C9|RPC=Reporting period] ({$j}) + [670-67:R14C10|RPC=Reporting period] ({$k})) <= 1}}
